channel.title: Adding Diffrent Maps
channel.description: okay so i wanna add some diffrent maps because the source or client that im using at the moment is all fcked up its like missing some parts and the maps are just screwed up is there any way i can get some maps from another server and put them on there im using "hybrid pvp" PI. thanks.

item.title: Adding Diffrent Maps
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

im cool12:

what folder do u think inside the cache is it in so i dont have to delete the whole thing. cause im just going to replace it but idk what folder it would be in

If you don’t have a “maps” folder or something similar, then it’s in the main_file_cache.dat, and you’re going to have to either parse it, replace the data, and save it, or replace it.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Diffrent Maps
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

im cool12:

okay so i wanna add some diffrent maps because the source or client that im using at the moment is all fcked up its like missing some parts and the maps are just screwed up is there any way i can get some maps from another server and put them on there im using “hybrid pvp” PI. thanks.

It sounds like more of a cache problem. You’ll need to replace your cache, or try to fix it by hand.

Read full topic
